020import com.google.common.io.ByteArrayDataOutput;
021import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
022import net.tnemc.bungee.message.MessageHandler;
023
024import java.io.DataInputStream;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.UUID;
027
028/**
029 * MessageMessageHandler
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public class MessageMessageHandler extends MessageHandler {
035
036  public MessageMessageHandler() {
037
038    super("message");
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void handle(final UUID server, final DataInputStream stream) {
043
044    try {
045      final String identifier = stream.readUTF();
046      final String message = stream.readUTF();
047
048      send(server, identifier, message);
049    } catch(IOException e) {
050      e.printStackTrace();
051    }
052  }
053
054  public static void send(final UUID server, final String identifier, final String message) {
055
056    final ByteArrayDataOutput out = ByteStreams.newDataOutput();
057
058
059    out.writeUTF(server.toString());
060    out.writeUTF(identifier);
061    out.writeUTF(message);
062
063
064    sendToAll("tne:message", out, false);
065  }
066}
